section.section:
The Administration shall:
Promote, develop, establish, conduct, certify, and monitor programs for the prevention, treatment, and rehabilitation related to the misuse of alcohol and drugs; and
Promote and conduct training and research related to the misuse of alcohol and drugs.

In cooperation with the Motor Vehicle Administration, courts, police, and other agencies, the Administration shall approve appropriate programs of alcohol and drug abuse education or treatment for individuals who are convicted under § 21-902 of the Transportation Article.
The programs under this paragraph shall be coordinated with and integrated into broad planning for comprehensive community health and welfare services.
